dev.name: Start Dev Server
dev.command: cd main && (pm2 delete subbly-dev -s || true) && pm2 start /project/workspace/main/ecosystem.config.js --attach -s

watch.name: Watch Dependencies
watch.command: cd main && export SHELL=/bin/bash; chokidar 'package.json' -c 'pnpm install --dangerously-allow-all-builds'
